Package com.advertisementproject.userservice.api.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.userservice.api.controller.UserController
@RestController
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for managing CRUD operations for customer users and company users, apart from registration which is handled by the registration controller.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private UserService userService
    Service for managing CRUD operations for customer users and company users.

  • Field Details

    • userService

      private final UserService userService
      Service for managing CRUD operations for customer users and company users. Does not handle registration.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> getAllUsers()
      Endpoint for ADMIN users to receive a list of all users
      Returns:
      response entity with a list of all users in the database

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getUserById​(@RequestHeader("userId") java.util.UUID id)
      Lets a user retrieve user and customer/company information via user id supplied in the header
      Parameters:
      id - the id for the currently logged in user to be retrieved, provided by Zuul Gateway in the header.
      Returns:
      customer user or company user info for the supplied id

    • deleteUserById

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteUserById​(@RequestHeader("userId") java.util.UUID id)
      Lets a user delete their own user information
      Parameters:
      id - the id for the currently logged in user to be deleted, provided by Zuul Gateway in the header.
      Returns:
      response entity with message that user has been deleted

    • updateUserById

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> updateUserById​(@RequestHeader("userId") java.util.UUID id, @RequestBody UpdateUserRequest updateUserRequest)
      Lets a user update their own user information
      Parameters:
      id - the id for the currently logged in user that should be updated, provided by Zuul Gateway in the header.
      updateUserRequest - request object with fields to update in the user and related customer/company
      Returns:
      customer user or company user that has just been updated
